channel.title: Background/maps/interfaces!
channel.description:
Well better then making 3 topics about 3 questions, I'll ask my questions in one topic :D I'm using Lost legacy base.
1- I've changed the size of my client and i got problem with the background size, Here's a picture:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vzbq0n.png[/img]
Any idea how i can change the background size same as the client? I think the problem not the [url=http://oi43.tinypic.com/2uh5ojo.jpg]background size[/url] because it's 900x 647 So probably the code which makes the client load at 756x 503 if so where i can find this code?
2- Missing maps at some areas, The problem is that i can find maps folder in my cache, So probably it loads from the source i guess, Not sure, Anyway how i can add this missing maps while i don't have the maps folder in my cache or how i can find the place which it loads from?
Pictures of some areas which missing maps: A- http://oi39.tinypic.com/10mj57b.jpg B- http://oi41.tinypic.com/2u5w6yp.jpg
3- Last question ;D Well, My client support resizable, and when i open any shop at the resizable client my shops will goes like that:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/15fhh20.png[/img]
Any idea how i can fix this interfaces? or where i can find the code for it?

item.title: Background/maps/interfaces!
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

Well better then making 3 topics about 3 questions, I’ll ask my questions in one topic
I’m using Lost legacy base.

1- I’ve changed the size of my client and i got problem with the background size, Here’s a picture:

vzbq0n.png792×602

Any idea how i can change the background size same as the client?
I think the problem not the background size because it’s 900x 647
So probably the code which makes the client load at 756x 503 if so where i can find this code?

2-
Missing maps at some areas, The problem is that i can find maps folder in my cache, So probably it loads from the source i guess, Not sure,
Anyway how i can add this missing maps while i don’t have the maps folder in my cache or how i can find the place which it loads from?

Pictures of some areas which missing maps:
A- http://oi39.tinypic.com/10mj57b.jpg
B- http://oi41.tinypic.com/2u5w6yp.jpg

3- Last question ;D
Well, My client support resizable, and when i open any shop at the resizable client my shops will goes like that:

15fhh20.png793×602

Any idea how i can fix this interfaces? or where i can find the code for it?
